name: 4dgl oled160-g2 notifier
tagline: android notifications to mOled-160-G2 via bluetooth
body:
### Android notifications to mOled-160-G2 via bluetooth.
-------------
A very simple step by step guide/tutorial to create a wireless(bluetooth) 1.7 inch monitor,
an android app to connect to it,and automatically send every notifications
from android to monitor.

#### required components
1)pic test
![pic test](https://github.com/avraampiperidis/4dgl_oled160-g2_notifier/blob/master/pagepics/pic1.png?raw=true)
